<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update the PCDS Tenant Resource Report Frequency</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/config/v3/tenant/resource/sizing/configure"}></MethodEndpoint>



Update the size reporting frequency at global for all tenant resources.

## Request
